mapper.select: select cscenter_key, user_key, cscenter_title, cscenter_contents, (SELECT user_name FROM `user` B WHERE B.USER_KEY=A.user_key) as user_name, cscenter_date from ( select A.cscenter_key, A.user_key, A.cscenter_title, A.cscenter_contents, A.cscenter_date, @rownum := @rownum+1 AS rnum from cscenter A, (select @rownum:=0) B order by cscenter_key ) A limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
SELECT cscenter_title, cscenter_contents, (SELECT user_name FROM `user` u WHERE u.USER_KEY=c.user_key) as user_name, cscenter_date FROM cscenter c WHERE cscenter_key=#{cscenter_key};
